title: Molten Zac
body: I'm back again, this time with a skin idea for Zac. I noticed he hasn't really got much love in that department. I've seen a lot of really cool ideas, and I thought I'd give it a try. How did I do?

replies.body: I really, really like this. I think it plays up his shape really well.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=2LOxI96E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-23T20:19:34.718+0000)
>
> I really, really like this. I think it plays up his shape really well.

How about me, do you think i play my shape well? personally i've been working out alot and trying to lose weight.

Edit: i broke my diet, i've gained 20 pounds.
it's a long road Jeff
When I found myself looking like a chicken strip, I knew something wasn't right.

> [{quoted}](name=MY NAMEH JEFF,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=2LOxI96E,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-23T20:21:59.658+0000)
>
> How about me, do you think i play my shape well? personally i've been working out alot and trying to lose weight.

^This. lol
Thanks! I was trying to think of a substance that was kind of goopy like him.

> [{quoted}](name=Torvaldin,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=2LOxI96E,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2015-01-23T20:30:20.675+0000)
>
> Thanks! I was trying to think of a substance that was kind of goopy like him.

Well I must say, you nailed it. XP Very nice.
Brb gotta go get my mind outa the gutter

That one or [This one](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/WB7adxuk-skin-suit-up-zac). I'd be okay paying for either... or both... or all of them i'm sure there are more in here that i would pay for ^.^ just need more lovin' for my man Zac

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=2LOxI96E,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-23T20:19:34.718+0000)
>
> I really, really like this. I think it plays up his shape really well.

Has the Skins department ever talked about doing an RGB or StayPuff skin for Zac?
What about a deep sea skin for zac just a thought
I like this. Mostly because it isn't just a recolor. It's unique compared to other concepts i've seen
{{champion:154}} : I should rethink that suit

I really like this idea, I stopped playing zac partly because I got tired of the same special weapon animation.

If I may add another concept to this thread, I've always liked the idea of aquarium/water spirit zac from a different thread, with fish swimming around inside him, maybe jelly fish, that sort of thing. (think like water elementals from world of warcraft, but with fish inside?)

Theres already a lot of water/coral sprites in the game from nami/coral malphite animations, it would be easy and cool to just recycle some of these, and im sure would be well received =D
Well done. I like your vision. The idea has been around for long and I think it should be executed. I've been working on the same concept myself, given it's still under works.
best skin suggestion i have ever seen 10/10 Zac needs a new skin and this one is perfect. would buy.
This has my vote. Works perfectly for Zac, unique, and it's something I don't think Riot's skin department should have too much trouble with.
YES! I WILL BUY ZAC JUST SO I CAN GET THIS SKIN IF IT GETS MADE
I don't play Zac but I would if this skin came out. It'd give me a reason for finally trying him.
I would actually consider getting the  champ after this skin.

You actually drew an idea I had on an old thread. Now this is something that Zac really needs. And I would not mind getting a skin like this for Zac.
{{champion:154}}
Wow, nice splash art! (aka bump)  This needs to be added. v:
absolutely amazing, totally would buy it even though I don't play zac :)
http://browser.gameguyz.com/upload/images/20140214_050606784.jpg

This and the "suit" Zac are the 2 skins I really like on him, but this one has to take the cake. It looks incredible. Maybe Riot can release a new skin for the blob while also giving him a boost in places he is lacking?
We need another Zac skin instead of a Jinx one. :(
I really like this skin concept. It looks really great.

Zac is on sale! Is he good in the meta right now? I thought about getting Urgot before, but everybody says he's awful. I literally never see Zac in my games. What lane is he best in? Most guides seem to put him in the jungle, but I already play 3 junglers. Is he OK at top? I'm used to tanky champs, and he's just really appealing. This skin would be great incentive!
insta buy
{{champion:154}} I WAS MADE FOR THIS! I WAS SOOO MADE FOR THIS!!!
thank you! finally, this is getting some more attention!
building liandrys torment is a must with this skin

I need to forget about creating topics the same day as you do xD But damn it it's always happening. 
Great job as always.
I don't mean it lol. Your ideas and art are really good. Keep it up.
Thanks :)

Rito please! D:
this HAS to be made!
Yes.

I've been thinking about this too, Like for instance his Q extends his arms like a lava whip, His W sends small meteors out, his E transorms him into a meteor and creates a small crater graphic when he lands, and his ult turn him into a molten boulder, his passive makes him 4 meteors with a movement graphic as a falling meteor that move together and then collide with small lava particles once he reforms.
great skin i will buy it becouse i am a great fan of zac{{champion:154}}

huh...now that is f ing cool wonder why riot hasnt done it yet. I would also say an ice one but....would make no sense since his vicsosity wil increase making him harder to move.....god im such a geek. But because screw logic zac also needs an ice skin =]
I can milk those..AAAHGAWD IT BURNS!
Awesome awesome skin. Please Katey!?

Man, Great concept you have here, this is a skin I would Definitely buy. Good work here Torvaldin :)

Although I must ask, would you happen to have any skin ideas for our lovely {{champion:6}} here?
Hmm, that's a tough one. But I could try.
Thats way to effin sick!!! lovein it.
I like it alot. Works well with his theme in being a goo monster, and would look great in game.
Dope skin
I feel like this could also be named Scorched Earth Zac to fit with the other group of skins, but this is really good!
Oh wow, I like it, I really really like it. Nice job there man, nice job indeed I must say there.
That doesn't look like Molten Zac, that looks like...Molten Tibbers!. MOLTEN ANNIE SKIN PLIS
